title: 820-00840: No Backlight
message:
Anyone seen or have suggestion regarding this issue. No backlight, can see dim image. Here are measurements taken:

 PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT: 54.17v   
 PP3V3_S0SW_LCD: 3.314   
 PP5V_S0SW_LCD: 5.12

title: 820-00840: No Backlight
message:
"PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT: 54.17v"
Backlight circuit is working.
You have open line to LED strip.
Bad LCD connector, video cable, or backlight LEDs into display.

title: 820-00840: No Backlight
message: Yeah that what i thought, but wanted to confirm there wasn't something else that could cause the display not to work before i purchase a replacement display. Testing the cable first. Thank you
